page.title: 14A FAMILY HOLIDAY
page.content: Last year our family went on holiday to Pontins at Southport.It took 3-4hrs to get there.Our chalet was on the fourth block.We were directly below where we were last year.That night we went to the Crocodile Club.It was great.We also watched an act by a Dutchman.He was very good.The next day I went to the Adventure Playground and after that I went swimming.When I finished swimming I looked for Capt.Blood.Me and my "wonderfull" brother ended up in the boating lake saturated.Mum was not pleased when I told her.We had to get changed.At night I went to the Croc. Disco and met a Scottish girl named Jill Kennedy.She was really nice and we now write to each other.It was a self-catering holiday. Most of our class stayed in England for their holidays.
